Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Model.Player_and_Board

Class Player

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Model.Player_and_Board.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(List<Card> hand, Board playerBoard)
    Constructs a player with a specified initial hand of cards and associated game board.

    • setStarterCard

      public void setStarterCard(StarterCard starterCard)
      Sets the starter card and notifies the player observer of the update. This method is synchronized to ensure thread safety.
      Parameters:
      starterCard - The new starter card to be set.
